	before(Object value): set(!volatile * *.*) && @target(test.AutoUndo) && args(value)
	{
		FieldSignature signature = (FieldSignature)thisJoinPoint.getSignature();
		Field field = signature.getField();
		System.out.println("Hello world: " + field);
	}
